DOC.brief_summary: Objective : This prospective study aim examine outcome atrial fibrillation ( AF ) ablation permanent pulmonary vein antrum isolation pulmonary vein antrum isolation plus left atrial posterior wall isolation proven repeat procedure . The study conduct patient different type AF : paroxysmal AF ( PAF ) non-PAF ( Persistent AF Long Standing Persistent AF ) . Hypothesis : In addition permanent pulmonary vein antrum isolation , proven isolation leave atrial posterior wall associate freedom atrial arrhythmia long-term follow-up atrial fibrillation ablation , especially non-PAF patient .
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Atrial Fibrillation Ablation After Permanent Pulmonary Vein Antrum Isolation With Without Proven Left Atrial Posterior Wall Isolation
DOC.criteria: 1 . â‰¥ 18 year 2 . AF patient undergo primary catheter ablation ( first procedure ) 3 . Ability give inform consent 1 . Previous ablation AF 2 . Bleeding disorder 3 . Reversible cause AF , hyperthyroidism phaeochromocytoma
